item.title: Tips and Tricks for Authoring Azure Developer CLI (azd) Templates
item.description: I’ve created several Azure Developer CLI (azd) templates over the past year. In this post, I share practical tips and tricks for authoring azd templates, including parameter management, naming conventions, hooks, pipelines and handling Entra ID resources.

item.title: Azure Integration Services Quickstart
item.description: I’ve recently published a Bicep template for quickly deploying Azure Integration Services, including Azure API Management, Function App, Logic App, Service Bus and Event Hubs namespace, along with supporting resources such as Application Insights, Key Vault and Storage Account.
